attributes.action: Urge the Prime Minister to put pressure on the EU and France to end Bullfighting
attributes.additional_details: Many regions in France do not practice this at all, yet some cities, departments and regions are still clinging to the past.  Put pressure on the French that we will not tolerate this practice in the EU.
attributes.background: Well, the title says it all. The UK banned cruelty to animals in 1830 yet the French and their Latin cousins around the world still practice this barbaric act. Help stop it forever.
